name: Wizard TD
description:
Wizard TD is a short but challenging Tower Defense game to test your strength against waves of incoming monsters. Hope you have as much fun playing as I had with the development. 

Feedback is always welcome :)

-------------------------Credit------------------------------

Thanks to everyone who made it possible through their free assets:

  • Background & Enemies by 0x72 
    • Link: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
